name: Certified Pilot
description: 100% Genuine Pilot. A Pilot is an elite soldier and operator of a Titan, possessing superior skills and equipment compared to the standard Grunt. Players take the role of Pilots in Titanfall and Titanfall 2, fighting as an operative of either the IMC, Frontier Militia or one of the many mercenaries out to seek fame and fortune from fighting the Frontier War.

ranks.name: EZ M' Bark
ranks.description: Entering and Exiting your Titan, is now a free action.
